nginx.description: Open source reverse proxy server for HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP, POP3, and IMAP protocols, as well as a load balancer, HTTP cache, and a web server.
nginx.more_info:
At startup the config file named default.conf gets created in the config volume if the directory is empty. Extend it with your own custom configuration.
An example configuration file can be found in the nginx wiki. The config volume can be refered as 
/config

/config.description: Choose a Share for the nginx configuration. Eg: create a Share called nginx-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/usr/share/nginx/html.description: Choose a Share for the files that nginx will serve (HTML, JavaScript, etc.). Eg: create a share called nginx-data for this purpose alone.
/usr/share/nginx/html.label: Served Content Storage
